An Origins addon that adds the Beach Crab, Deer, Moth, and Penguin origins to the game. More detailed Origins information and mod compatibility notes can be found at our Wiki.

 

 

 

 

 

Click here for the Forge port!

This mod is sponsored by Bisect Hosting!

  • Akto for creating a noteblock cover of the Crab Rave song
  • ItsYoBoi from the Origins discord for the original Deer Origin
  • An Origins discord server user for the feeding powers (I can't find the person I got it from, please let me know)
